Accellion Secure Collaboration

Accellion Secure Collaboration makes it easy for enterprise users to share confidential information with internal and external parties while ensuring enterprise security and compliance. With Accellion, organizations can improve productivity by provisioning users with the ability to securely share and manage proprietary content and confidential personal information directly from a laptop, smartphone, tablet, or other web-enabled device.

The free 45-day trial supports up to 5 users and provides the full-functionality of Accellion Secure Collaboration with Accellion Mobile Apps and includes: 

  • Accellion Secure Workspaces (comments, notifications, file versioning, search, secure file transfer)
  • Mobile access to secure workspace files and folders
  • LDAP/AD integration
  • Accellion Secure File Transfer with Microsoft Outlook email plug-in
  • Custom branding â€“ logo, graphics, tagline
  • Web-based IT administrative console multi-admin support

The 45-day trial of Accellion Secure Collaboration is designed for deployment in VMware virtual environments.  If you are interested in a trial of Accellion with a different deployment option, please request to Have a Rep Call Me Now on the form below.
Please enter your contact information below to try Accellion.  All fields are required so your request can be promptly processed.  Once you complete the registration process, you will receive download instructions via email.

Note:  If you are an individual having difficulty accessing a file that you received, please contact the sender.  As a recipient of a secure file, it is not necessary to download this trial version of Accellion.
